attributes.action: Give compensation to the pub restaurant industry to ofset lost revenue due to smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
farmers have always enjoyed compensation for diseases etc that other trades have to pay insurance for 
farmers for some reason are paid from central government
due to government policy in imposing a smoking ban on bars restaurants etc
we would ask for similar compensation
for lack of trade due to a 50 percent drop in trade in over 90 percent of public houses brought on solely by government legislation
